name: Spicy Pickled Carrots
description: These sweet and spicy pickled carrots are simple to make. The chef Pierre Thiam pairs them with black-eyed pea fritters, but they make a great condiment for just about everything.
keywords: carrot, fish sauce, habañero, scotch bonnet pepper, serrano pepper, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 cups coarsely grated or julienned carrots
1 Scotch bonnet or habanero pepper, finely diced
1 teaspoon Vietnamese fish sauce, such as Red Boat

recipeInstructions.text: In a large metal bowl, combine the carrots, peppers, onion, salt and fish sauce. Toss well to combine.

Place the sugar and vinegars in a small pot and bring to a boil over high heat, stirring to dissolve. Once the mixture is at a rapid boil, pour it over the seasoned carrots. Let cool to room temperature before using. Store in the refrigerator for up to 3 weeks.
